modName: Skyrim Meets Metal Intro by Erock
summary: Metal cover of Skyrim Intro replacment
descriptionHtml:
**BEFORE YOU ASK, YES I HAVE PERMISSION OF THE ORIGINAL ARTIST TO USE THIS SONG**

This is my first mod ever, hope you like it.

I was inspired by Robbaz King of Sweden and Erock the Shredder.

This replaces the intro music with Erock\'s metal rendition.

To uninstall the entire mod simply delete the files it adds to the following folder:

/data/music/combat/


Original track:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yDE2VQzghp4

Erock\'s website:
http://www.shredguitareric.com/
author: Excision

files.name: Skyrim Meets Metal Intro by Erock
